step.title: Run bootstrap script
step.para: Before building MyAdmin itself some dependencies are needed for the build itself (mainly ant tasks). A bootstrap ant script is provided that will set up the environment needed to build. It is located at de.pellepelster.myadmin.build/ant/MyAdminBuildBootstrap.xml the default target loads all dependencies (via Ivy).

step.title: Set up Ivy
step.para: Some dependencies are not available in any public repositories and therefore not resolvable by Ivy. A custom ivysettings.xml containing repositories for all needed dependencies is provided. To use it choose Window PreferencesIvySettings from the main menu bar and add ${workspace_loc:de.pellepelster.myadmin.build/ant/ivysettings.xml} as Ivy Settings Path.

step.title: Get Eclipse for PDE build
step.para: For building the Eclipse integration a local Eclipse distribution with Apache Ivy and XText is needed. A prepacked one is available here. The MyAdmin build by default expects it to be extracted under ${user.home}/java/eclipse_pdebuild, you can override this behaviour by providing custom build properties to the build.

section.title: Custom build properties
section.para: To alter the default build behaviour, or provide custom locations (e..g for the Eclipse PDE build) you can override the default build properties file located at de.pellepelster.myadmin.build/ant/properties/default.build.properties by copying it to a new one and replacing the default with your local user id.
